response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. Given its value and quality, I believe it's worth more than what it costs others, but considering its significance to you, I propose a special introductory price of $12,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in its ability to make a positive impact on your endeavors. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your budget and requirements, so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 12000}
